校外: (こうがい) - off-campus; out of school
校書殿: (こうしょでん) - pavilion housing the historical archives (in Heian Palace)
校正: (こうせい) - (校正 only) proofreading/correction of press; calibration

校正刷り: (こうせいずり) - galley proofs; proof sheet; printer's proof

栩葺: (とちぶき) - shingling using thick roof shingles; roof shingled in such a manner (usu. shrine buildings, noh stages, etc.)

株: (kabu) - stocks , stock, share; stump; root, rootstock; strain (de bactérias, etc.)

株が下がる: (かぶがさがる) - to fall in public esteem; to fall in value (stocks)
